LanguageData.BuildRPG.label: 건설 : RPG-7
LanguageData.BuildRPG.description: Builds the RPG-7 (rocket propelled grenade). Slow to reload and slow to fire. It must be reloaded after every shot.\n구경 : RPG-7 Grenade
LanguageData.BuildM5_USCM.label: 제작 : M5 RPG
LanguageData.BuildM5_USCM.description: Builds the M5 Rocket Propelled Grenade (RPG). It is a portable, shoulder-fired, reloadable, semi-automatic unguided anti-armor rocket-propelled grenade launcher. Able to load up to 4 rockets.\n구경 : RPG-7 Grenade
LanguageData.BuildLAW.label: 제작 : M72 LAW
LanguageData.BuildLAW.description: Builds the M72 LAW, an anti-tank 로켓 런처 with a special armor-piercing penetration rocket.\n구경 : M72 LAW
